title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4029.9 - Minimum weight for overnight races; exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4029.9 - Minimum weight for overnight races; exceptions

State Regulations

In all overnight races for two-year-olds, for
three-year-olds, or for four-year-olds and upward the minimum weight shall be
112 pounds, subject to sex and apprentice allowances. This rule shall not apply
to handicaps, nor to races for three-year-olds and upward. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4029.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
